cast.overview: When Dr. Indiana Jones – the tweed-suited professor who just happens to be a celebrated archaeologist – is hired by the government to locate the legendary Ark of the Covenant, he finds himself up against the entire Nazi regime.
cast.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark

details.biography: New York City born, Pittsburgh raised Actor/Producer/Director is a former World-Class Athlete having won a Bronze Medal for the United States in the 1985 World Games, London and named All-World All-Star in 1987. Starting in Pittsburgh Theater, then films and television followed. Currently living in New York City as Writer/Producer/Director for TV and Stage.  - IMDb Mini Biography By: Chris Frederick
details.name: Christopher Frederick
details.place_of_birth: New York City, New York, USA
